# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Chef
The Chef is responsible for cooking food for the crew. They can achieve this by cooking food in the kitchen and serving it to the crew.
## Do - Cook food for the crew. - Serve food to the crew. - Declare war on the mice, cockroaches and snails.
## Don't - Disclose the source of the meat used in the food. It all goes down the same way.
